```{r setup}
library(carolinaKernels)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)

plays <- PLAYS
pff <- PFFScoutingData

plays <- plays %>%
  left_join(pff %>% select(gameId,playId,snapDetail,
                           kickDirectionIntended,kickDirectionActual,hangTime),
            by=c("gameId","playId"),snapDetail=snapDetail)

getPlot_kick_playType(plays,"Punt")
getPlot_kick_result(plays,"Punt")
getPlot_results(plays,"Punt")
getPlot_kick_playResult(plays,"Punt")
getPlot_down_kick(plays,"Punt")
getPlot_team_yardage(plays,"Punt")
getPlot_hangTime(plays,"Punt")
getPlot_topPunters(plays,"Punt")
getPlot_topKickers(plays,"Punt")
```
